title: Andrei Rublev
plot: Andreiv Rublev charts the life of the great icon painter through a turbulent period of 15th Century Russian history, a period marked by endless fighting between rival Princes and by Tatar invasions.::L.H. Wong <as9401k56@ntuvax.ntu.ac.sg>
The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer.::Karl Krejci
